items.content_html:
Oooooh! NOFX farewell tour coming to Tacoma! 100% there!

A bit of an evil approach though. Full weekend tix on sale now. Single day on sale later in the year if they don’t sell out via full weekend passes.

Still, last chance to see NOFX so ya gotta do what ya gotta do!
items.content_text:

items.content_html:
Currently reading: How to Do Nothing: Resisting the Attention Economy by Jenny Odell üìö

Started reading this right before all the bird related drama started. Needless to say I’m failing at everything the book is about. Hoping to finish it off over the holidays and do better!
